pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Echinacea 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to support the immune system to fight illness.

Echinacea is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to support healthy immune system function to fight illness.

Size: 50 mL

Ingredients

EACH 3 mL CONTAINS:
Echinacea purpurea (Echinacea) herb ext. liquid 2.7 mL
derived from dry -----2.7g

Also contains: glycerol and peppermint oil.

Contains 40.5% alcohol.

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

You can expect a bitter taste which is typical of herbal extracts and all of their goodness.

Complemented with natural peppermint oil.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take 3 mL daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Drop directly onto
the tongue or dilute in 30 ml of water or juice and consume immediately.

Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a cool, dry
place. Do not use if cap seal or
inner seal is missing or broken.
